page.title: 04HURLFORD/CROOKEDHOLM SHOPS.
page.content: In Hurlford and Crookedholm there are shops like the butchers, Co-op, newsagents, grocers, post-office and the bank. Most people do their shopping during the week in those shops. Then at the weekend they go to the supermarkets in Kilmarnock, like Wm.Lows, Tesco and Presto. Most people get their food in Kilmarnock because there is the best variety of shops. They get their clothes from Kilmarnock as well and also their shoes, medicines and electrical goods. There is a bank in Hurlford, the Clydesdale, so it is necessary to go to Kilmarnock for the other banks. The post office is small but the G.P.O is in Kilmarnock two miles away.
